item.description:
People can just browse their plants, or there will be a speaker there from the Boston Globe at 10 am "The Wonderful Use of Wildflowers w/ Carol Stocker " You can register at http://www.lakestreet.com/register/

If its a nice day we could have lunch afterwards at Jody's Place. They have outdoor seating. I know this may not work for people since it is next weekend, but I thought it might be fun for people who aren't already booked. Hard to say for sure what the weather will be, but right now they are saying clear and 72 degrees for the 28th.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Anyone interested in the spring open house at Lake St. Garden Center -Salem, NH?
